name: Compact Light For Thunderbird (DevEdition Theme)
description: This style ports Firefox's <strike>Dev Edition</strike> Compact Light theme to Thunderbird.
additional_info:
It is based on Laron's Numix Tabs for Thunderbird 15+ and Firefox Dev Edition. https://userstyles.org/styles/117550/numix-tabs-for-thunderbird-15 https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/developer/

Dark theme here: https://userstyles.org/styles/126807/compact-dark-for-thunderbird-devedition-theme

==Changelog==
8/12/16:
Updated style to slightly newer dev edition style
8/16/16:
Replaced tabs with spaces
No longer looks ugly when the window isn't maximized
Tab text is semi-transparent when window is inactive
8/29/16:
Tabs stay the same height always
1/23/17:
Updated name
